title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 205.13 - Assignment of mediator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 205.13 - Assignment of mediator

State Regulations

Upon receipt of the notification of impasse, the director of
conciliation shall appoint a mediator from a list of qualified persons
maintained by the board to assist the parties to effect a voluntary resolution
of their collective negotiations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
205.13

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
